LanguageData.JRWSuchomimus.label: Suchomimus
LanguageData.JRWSuchomimus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #01997-1998 [SUCHOMIMUS TENERENSIS] CODENAME: SCYTHE >17
A spinosaurid with an agressive temper and a crooked, teeth riddled maw. Their arched neck allows them to strike quickly, and their claws are perfect for slicing up fish - or colonists.
